Generating charts

Note: for a Product tour and instructional videos please visit: vQuery Youtube Channel

Overview

vQuery makes it easier to generate charts by providing a no-code interface where one can create charts by providing a small amount of information.

A python script editor is also available as well as the following plotting libraries: Plotly, Matplotlib, Seaborn. Most charts can be generated by providing the two first parameters only. The histogram chart only needs at least one

The following APIs are available for scripting:

  • Matplotlib
  • Plotly
  • Seaborn

NOTE: the examples shown in the screenshots below are generated from Plotly Express library embedded datasets.
